cloudAccountName.description:
The name of the Alibaba Cloud account.

Use this value as the 'name' field in the 'POST /v3.0/cam/alibabaAccounts' API.

cloudAccountDescription.description:
The description of the Alibaba Cloud account.

Use this value as the 'description' field in the 'POST /v3.0/cam/alibabaAccounts' API.

alibabaRegion.description:
The region of Terraform backend where the state files are stored.

> **Important** > > The default region is based on your Trend Vision One region.

name.description:
The name of the security services connected to the system.

Available values:
* `workload` - Server & Workload Protection

instanceIds.description: The instance ID of the associated security service.

connectedSecurityServices.description: The security service associated with the connected Alibaba Cloud account.
